column4: ok, im in the feisty 64 bit live cd, and i have to remove grub as the bootloader, so i can get back in and shrink vista's partition
i need to clear the master boot record for /dev/sda, so my bios will use /dev/sda2 (which has the bootable flag set on it)
or just make windows boot from the live cd, bypassing grub
first try to select 800x600 in vga mode
